author: jameshe5018
content: ~~Question from the call... it seems like we don't want to do testnets until things are more stable with devnet3/devnet5 launch, as I know Holesky is shutting down end of the month. Originally scheduled for the 15th to deploy/fusaka hardfork I believe, is that something we'd still want to deploy to just to see how things are before it shuts down?~~ nvm the blog said 2 weeks after fusaka finalization

author: ralexstokes
content:
yeah, most of the timing questions for fusaka at this point are conditional on getting through a successful devnet-5

and everyone is on top of fixing devnet-3 issues to get to devnet-5

author: ralexstokes
content:
**ACDC #164 Action Items**
* Continue progress on `fusaka-devnet-3` debugging
* Clients should aim to have Fusaka code on trunk branches by Monday 8 Sep
* Review these changes to the Protocol Upgrade Process document and add input there
  * https://github.com/ethereum/pm/pull/1715
